speech:
I'll replace cigarettes when I think of them
I recommend that you decide in advance
Did you brush your teeth? I recommend brushing your teeth
Drink a glass of cold water

"Whenever I think of cigarettes, I think about what I can do immediately
It's helpful to be prepared in advance."
Try using your hands a lot like knitting.
Playing the piano can also help.
You'd better not smoke if you want to save on cigarette gradients!
Just work out. The joy of dopamine from exercising is bigger, more powerful, and more addictive than the joy of dopamine from nicotine!

"Use your smartphone alarm to hold it for five minutes.
The powerful temptation of cigarettes reaches its peak in less than minutes
It often disappears, so five minutes will help."
Why don't you go for a walk?
Take a deep breath of tea or water.
